articles.title: With Many Stores Closed, Salvation Army's Bell-Ringing Campaign Suffers - NPR
articles.description: With traffic down at stores and malls across the nation during the pandemic, the charity's iconic red-kettle campaign might bring in half the donations compared with last year.
articles.content:
The Salvation Army's red-kettle campaign is expecting fewer donations and volunteers this year as a result of the coronavirus pandemic.
Charles Rex Arbogast/AP
